title: CRPSEN Photo Custom!Picture Custom!Made in US DIY Diamond Embroidery 5D Diamond Painting Cross Stitch 3D Diamond Mosaic Rhinestone Decoration
features: ☞❃Custom photo diamond painting, tips: the larger the size, the better the effect,If there are many people, it is recommended that the large size, you can contact customer service to get the best size recommendation

☞❃Personalized this diamond painting by click" Customized now" . Then upload your photo and add to chart. We will make any pictures including People, Animal, Landscape, Flower.The larger the size, the better the visual effect.If the picture is complex, small size will not very good!
☞❃ Diamond Painting Kit Item Includes: Soft Painting Canvas, Resin Beads,stone Tray and Pen, heart glue, Elbow iron tweezers，Handguard sleeve,Multi-drill pen head
☞❃ Painting Need To Be Kept Clean, Otherwise, The Adhesive Strength Is Affected. If There Is Dirt Adhesion Can Influence Them
☞❃ Note:The Product Not Included The Frame.It Is Just A Rolled Canvas.Please Frame It By Glasses or Wooden and Hang In Your Home As for Decoration Adornments
description: Brand: CRPSEN  Hello, dear friends, welcome to our shop, we are so happy to meet you at here. Our company hopes that you can get fun from DIY products. Focused on Diamond Painting Cross Stitch for 12 years Dear DIY enthusiasts! We offer you a completely new kind of creativity "Diamond embroidery" or as it is also called "Diamond mosaic" and "Diamond painting". We will never stop to amaze you! Now, to create a picture you need not be an artist! Just choose a set of our product and create it! Making diamond painting helps to relieve stress, develop active thinking, therefore it is advisable to involve the creation of masterpieces and your children! This is a very exciting and interesting process, and the result will please you for a long time, the interior decorating!

Material: Cotton + Resin [DIY Diamond painting production steps]: Step 1: The beads in the numbered packets correspond with the color chart on the side of the painting. Place a few of the same numbered beads in the plastic tray; Step 2: Take the "Pen" and dab the end with the sticky stuff （red Solid Glue） in the square block, then pick up a bead by the “Pen”; Step 3: Stick the corresponding diamonds and then stick the diamonds on to the corresponding numbered canvas; Step 4: The rest of the diamonds can be put in to the valve bag; Step 5: Use book or your hands to press the diamonds to ensure it's stoutness. When finished, frame it by glass or wooden frame and hang on your home as for decoration adornments.
Tips: As the product is a manual drilling method, there were may be some missing diamonds. If such a situation occurs, please contacts us. We will reply you within 24 hours, until you are satisfied.
